full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Request for Proposal

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a Senior Project Leader/Executive consultant to support the objectives of the Fighter Capability Office (FCO) and to define and monitor the scope, deliverables, and implementation conditions that apply to the Department's future fighter capability requirements.

### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number:** W8485-TSPS2023-01/B
* **Closing Date:** January 13, 2023, at 14:00 Eastern Standard Time (EST)
* **Estimated Level of Effort:** 240 days per year
* **Contract Duration:** Two (2) years, with three (3) irrevocable option years

### Project Description

The FCO requires the services of one (1) Senior Project Leader/Executive consultant to support the development of fighter capability requirements. The proposed consultant will be responsible for defining and monitoring the scope, deliverables, and implementation conditions that apply to the Department's future fighter capability requirements.

### Eligibility

This request for proposal is open only to the below list of pre-qualified suppliers under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) agreement:

< embedded list of pre-qualified suppliers >

### Selection Criteria

The proposed consultant will be evaluated based on their ability to meet the Department's requirements, including:

* Demonstrated experience in project management services
* Proven track record of success in similar projects
* Ability to work effectively in a team environment
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills

### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation will be conducted in accordance with the Department's evaluation criteria outlined in the request for proposal document.

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Sharon Sally, Department of National Defence, at DapServicesBidReceiving-DoaServicesReceptionDesSoumissions@forces.gc.ca. Documented storage: DAP Instructions Requisition Canada (DIRMAC) system, Operation/Service Name: DAP-01 Engagement des consultants / DIRMAC Operation Name: AuProvement.

#### IMPORTANT NOTE:

The request for proposal document and all related materials are available upon request. The proposed consultant must have a valid Security Clearance and meet all the requirements as outlined in the request for proposal document. Failure to provide such information may result in the exclusion of the proposal from the evaluation process.
